description: Main entry point for a Flutter application, defining the app structure with a primary widget and a home page displaying a loading message.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget setting up MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the build method for MyHomePage, rendering a scaffold with app bar and centered loading message.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the application interface.
